SEARCH
Package de.edux.augmentation.io

Klasse AugmentationImageReader

java.lang.Object
de.edux.augmentation.io.AugmentationImageReader
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IAugmentationImageReader
public class AugmentationImageReader extends Object implements IAugmentationImageReader
Implementation of IAugmentationImageReader to read image paths from a specified directory.

This class is used to read and stream the paths of images from a given directory. It's part of the image augmentation process where image file paths are required for further processing.

  • Methodendetails

    • readImagePathsAsStream

      public Stream<Path> readImagePathsAsStream(String directoryPath) throws IOException
      Reads all image file paths from a specified directory and returns them as a stream.

      This method walks through the directory denoted by the given path and collects the paths of all files found. It is designed to efficiently handle large directories by streaming the paths instead of storing them in memory.

      Angegeben von:
      readImagePathsAsStream in Schnittstelle IAugmentationImageReader
      Parameter:
      directoryPath - The path to the directory from which image paths are to be read.
      Gibt zurück:
      A Stream of Path objects, each representing a path to a file in the directory.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If an I/O error is encountered when accessing the directory.
